God now calls upon all who choose to serve Him, to stand on the platform of eternal truth. Let those who have brought about the present state of things, by making the division that exists, stop to consider seriously before going any farther. Change your course of action. "Choose you this day whom ye will serve." "If the Lord be God,

follow Him: but if Baal, then follow him" (Joshua 24:15; 1 Kings 18:21).
